1.title: Email Address
1.question_text: Users enter their email address for account creation and verification

2.title: Email Confirmation
2.question_text: Users re-enter their email address to confirm accuracy

3.title: Password
3.question_text: Users create a secure password for their account

4.title: Password Confirmation
4.question_text: Users re-enter their password to confirm accuracy

5.title: Workplace Code
5.question_text: Users can optionally enter a workplace code if their organization is partnered with SPHERE

6.title: Phone Number
6.question_text: Users enter their phone number with country selection

7.title: Preferred Communication Method
7.question_text: Users select how they prefer to be contacted

8.title: First Name
8.question_text: Users enter their first name for personalization

9.title: Last Name
9.question_text: Users enter their last name for personalization

10.title: Location/Province
10.question_text: Users select their location from a dropdown list

11.title: Operating System Preference
11.question_text: Users select their preferred operating system

12.title: Resources Format
12.question_text: Users select their preferred content format

13.title: Nature of Work
13.question_text: Users describe the nature of their work to help personalize their experience

14.title: Work Environment
14.question_text: Users select an image that best represents their current workspace setup

15.title: Equipment Selection
15.question_text: Users select images of the equipment they use

16.title: Pain Assessment
16.question_text: Do you experience pain or discomfort while working? Or do you have pain in your upper body (arms, shoulders, hands)?

18.title: Nature of Role
18.question_text: Users define how they work with picture selection

19.title: Pain Assessment
19.question_text: Do you experience pain or discomfort due to standing or being on your feet? Or experience pain in upper body (arms, shoulders, hands?)

20.title: Vehicle Type
20.question_text: Users select an image that best represents their current workspace setup

21.title: Pain Assessment
21.question_text: Do you experience pain or discomfort while working? Or do you have pain in your upper body (arms, shoulders, hands)?
